question: Which countryâ€™s team clinched Under-17 boys Subroto Cup International Football Tournament 2018?
explanation: On 20th of November, the Bangladesh Krida Shiksha Prothishtan (BKSP) clinched the 59th edition of the junior boys Subroto Cup International Football Tournament 2018. In the final,  BKSP defeated Amini School of Afghanistan by a solitary goal at the Ambedkar Stadium in New Delhi.   A total of 95 teams participated in the tournament, including 8 teams from Afghanistan, Bangladesh and Nepal.
